name: Unidentified_Pre-Mor_officer_3
content:
A human officer lived during the Imperial Era and worked for Preox-Morlana's Pre-Mor Security Inspection team in 5 BBY. When Deputy Inspector Syril Karn sought a Kenari human male on Ferrix, Cassian Andor, for questioning in the deaths of Verlo Skiff and Kravas Drezzer, the officer participated in the investigation. Karn's arrival to discuss progress in the case interrupted the officer's consumption of glowblue noodles.
The officer first appeared in the Andor television series episode "Kassa." The character is portrayed by Alex Austin and credited as "Officer #3."
